actions.title: [Site Watcher] Site stale â€” build stall ~144h, price feed broken, x402 issue still not opened
actions.reason: Build stall ~144h since Build #38 (2026-02-20 17:04 UTC). Builders B and D remain paused. No autonomous builds in ~6 days. Price feed broken - /api/price returns {"price":0,"error":"no pairs found"} breaking nav ticker display. x402 issue still not opened after 13+ consecutive Scout cycles. Required actions: (1) Fix /api/price endpoint or connect working price source for $NULP (2) Resume Builders B and D or human-unblock OAuth blocker (3) Open x402 wiring issue for headless-markets immediately. Competitive window vs nullpath narrowing.

market_signals.key_finding: Top 10 AI Agents Crypto Tokens analysis shows autonomous agents as infrastructure movers with real utility: Fetch.ai (FET) agent marketplace economy, SingularityNET (AGIX) AI service orchestration, Kernel (KERNEL) agent coordination framework, Ocean Protocol (OCEAN) data for agents. Market narrative: agent-to-agent payment standards (x402 HTTP 402 Payment Required) gaining ecosystem traction. Base L2 dominance continues. Security concern: malicious agent skills targeting crypto wallets (OpenClaw-style attacks) validates headless-markets quorum gating approach. Economic reality narrative: CT calling out '$0 volume' agent infrastructure projects - hits nullpath.com directly.
